value: **The following simulations create the data that is then used in Figure 1. The simulations can take a considerable amount of time to finish. The files that were created during the simulations (binary_error.dta and cont_error.dta) with the referenced do-files are therefore already included in the folder 1-MC. Re-running the do-files will replace the existing data.
